article_node.title: Bret Taylor's Sierra raises $350M at a $10B valuation
article_node.summary: Sierra, a customer‑service AI agent startup founded by former Salesforce co‑CEO Bret Taylor and Google veteran Clay Bavor, closed a $350 million round led by Greenoaks Capital, valuing the company at $10 billion. The funding brings total capital raised to $635 million and follows earlier $110 million and $175 million rounds. Sierra already serves hundreds of enterprise customers such as SoFi, Ramp, and Brex, and plans to use the new capital to expand its platform, US growth, and international presence.
